column4: is there some way for people reading this chat to see what i have written before?
or do i have to repeat my question?
can i highlight it and copy paste?
i tried but cannot see a copy menu when i right click?
yes i am a new used
my middle button is a wheel
try the up arrow key also. proberly a history feature
i would suggest to not use hibernate/suspend  Unless you REALLY need it. it can cause issues with some hardware.
my screensaver and stuff work fine. its the hibernate/suspend special features that oiften have propblems
i leave my pc's on for weeks at a time.
or i shutdown/reboot - given its about a 30 sec boot time for me.. its not a big deal
pastebinit is a command you inztall.
you may want to 'reinstall' and make your swap partion larger. if you must use hibernate/suspend
:  i would say - not use hibernate/suspend untill you get more linux skills learned then. and can attempt a reisntall. a 'fix' of this might be just as hard if not harder then a reinstall
there is no 'magical one command' to fix it.
time to learn more linux basics then untill its not gibberish.. or try to do a reinstall.
reinstall or 'resize' the existing partitions. are the 2 options
